alert.note: Alert for Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 5:56PM CDT until June 28 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OLMSTED COUNTY... At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eyota, or 10 miles east of Rochester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dover around 605 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Chester, Marion, and Predmore. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 218 and 232. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
